sentences.english: The gray underwear wadded over a belt says So what.
sentences.chinese: 內衣褲被卷在一根帶子上，卻說那又如何。

sentences.english: Rather, they should be flesh-coloured under white shirts.
sentences.chinese: 此外，白色職業裝必須搭配淺肉色內衣褲。

sentences.english: The flattening of underwear with pleasure is the job of the chambermaid.
sentences.chinese: 女服務員的工作就是滿心歡喜地將內衣褲壓平。

sentences.english: Come on, man, I'm running out of underwear.
sentences.chinese: 別鬧了，夥計，我已經沒有多餘的內衣褲了。

sentences.english: When the small dealer was small, he didn't like to wear smalls .
sentences.chinese: 小商販在小的時候，不喜歡穿內衣褲。

sentences.english: I don't believe in the after life, although I am bringing a change of underwear.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信有死後生命，但我還是會帶上換洗的內衣褲。

sentences.english: They might advance us cash to buy a few pieces of underwear.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能會借給我們點兒錢，讓我們先買幾件內衣褲。

sentences.english: Chinese sailors stripped to their underwear as their boat closed in.
sentences.chinese: 中國船繼續靠近，而且船員脫到只剩下內衣褲。

sentences.english: Wakata's fellow astronauts may have noticed that he does not change his underpants very often.
sentences.chinese: 若田光一的宇航員夥伴也許注意到他不常換洗內衣褲。

sentences.english: Women's underclothes are a common fetish .
sentences.chinese: 女人的內衣褲是常見的能引起性快感的戀物。

sentences.english: Professional production of comfortable and beautiful high-end men's boutique-type cotton lycra underwear.
sentences.chinese: 專業生產舒適美觀型全棉拉架高檔男士精品內衣褲。

sentences.english: As well as shoes, underwear contains materials that can cause severe reactions.
sentences.chinese: 不僅鞋子，內衣褲也含有一些會引發過敏反應的東西。

sentences.english: I remember that I gave him a lot of underwear and bed linen .
sentences.chinese: 我記得我給他帶了很多換洗的內衣褲和牀單被罩。

sentences.english: Kaz's father had been out back weeding the vegetables in his underclothes .
sentences.chinese: 和子的父親穿着內衣褲在屋外後院的菜地裏除草。

sentences.english: My lingerie looks better on me than you - sayonara!
sentences.chinese: 我的內衣褲看起來都比你更合適我，再見。

sentences.english: I took off my trousers and wrung them too, then my shirt and under clothing.
sentences.chinese: 我把褲子也脫下來擰乾，接着脫襯衫和內衣褲。

definition: spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
to bind a person's upper body, with arms tied behind the back and rope looped around the neck/to truss up
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
